step1.title: List Your Space
step1.description: Create your listing with photos, description, and pricing. Set your own schedule and house rules.

step2.description: Review and approve booking requests. Communicate directly with guests through our secure messaging.

step3.title: Get Paid
step3.description: Receive payments securely after each booking. Track your earnings and payouts in your dashboard.

verification.title: Verified Bookings
verification.description: All guests must verify their identity and provide professional credentials before booking.

q1.question: How much does it cost to list my space?
q1.answer: Listing your space on Keysely is completely free. We only charge a 15% service fee on successful bookings, so you only pay when you earn.

q2.question: How do I get paid?
q2.answer: Payments are processed automatically 24 hours after each completed booking. Funds are transferred directly to your bank account via Stripe Connect.

q3.question: What if a guest damages my property?
q3.answer: All bookings are covered by our Host Protection Program, providing up to $1M in damage protection. Simply file a claim within 48 hours of discovering damage.

q4.question: Can I cancel a booking?
q4.answer: Yes, but we encourage hosts to honor confirmed bookings. Cancellations may affect your listing's ranking and availability. Review our cancellation policy for details.
